text: Andreas Obst (born 13 July 1996) is a German professional basketball player, who currently plays for the ratiopharm Ulm of the Basketball Bundesliga. ==Professional career== On 14 June 2016, Obst was sent on loan to Gießen 46ers by Brose Bamberg. On 5 July 2017, he signed with Oettinger Rockets, newcomer in the first tier Basketball Bundesliga. On 2 June 2018, he signed a three- year deal with Monbus Obradoiro of the Liga ACB. On July 1, 2019, he assigned a two-year deal with ratiopharm Ulm of the Basketball Bundesliga. ==International career== In 2016, Obst was selected for the German national basketball team, to play in the qualification rounds for the EuroBasket 2017. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Brose Bamberg players Category:German expatriate basketball people in Spain Category:German men's basketball players Category:Gießen 46ers players Category:Obradoiro CAB players Category:Power forwards (basketball) Category:Ratiopharm Ulm players Category:Rockets (basketball club) players Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Halle (Saale) Category:2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup players
title: Andreas Obst
